Label: Event 1
Value: Spanish expedition commanded by Magellan and Elcano first to circle Earth

Label: Event 2
Value: The Bible is translated into English by John Wycliffe.

Label: Event 3
Value: Isaac Newton publishes Philosophiae Naturalis Principia Mathematica.

Label: Event 4
Value: First reported African slaves in The New World

Label: Event 5
Value: The 'great plague' in various parts of Tudor England.
